alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:11AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nance, northeastern Hamilton, Merrick, southwestern Polk and southeastern Howard Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 510 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palmer, or 20 miles north of Grand Island, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Palmer around 515 AM CDT. Archer around 530 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Central City, Marquette, Hordville and Polk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Polk; York
